1. Fallout and Elder Scrolls boss Todd Howard defends AI in game development, but aims to "protect artistry" and "human intention" in his games  Eurogamer
  2. Todd Howard says AI can't replace human 'creative intention,' but it's part of Bethesda's 'toolset for how we build our worlds or check things'  PC Gamer
  3. Elder Scrolls and Fallout boss Todd Howard says AI is a useful "tool" in game dev, but "not in generating things" because "the human intention of it is what makes our stuff special"  GamesRadar+
  4. 'I View It As a Tool' Todd Howard Comments on AI in Game Development  OpenCritic
  5. Todd Howard On AI Use And Future Adaptations  EGW.News

item.title: Romancing Saga, a Square Enix JRPG released in 1992, remade in 2005, and remastered in 2022, gets yet another re-release: "I had always wanted to make a grand fantasy RPG in the style of The Lord of the Rings" - GamesRadar+
